channel.title: Reference on TRISA Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on TRISA Documentation

item.title: Glossary
item.description: General Terminology Originator: The initiator of a blockchain transaction and therefore also the initiator of a TRISA transfer. The “originator” can refer to the originating VASP, the originating customer of the VASP or both. Beneficiary: The recipient of a blockchain transaction and therefore also the recipient of a TRISA transfer. The “beneficiary” can refer to the beneficiary VASP, the beneficiary customer of the VASP or both.
